tit.e: Higaida Otsuka-kofun Tumulus (a tumulus in Makimuku-kofun Tumuli Cluster in Sakurai City, Nara Prefecture)
Higaida Otsuka-kofun Tumulus (a tumulus in Makimuku-kofun Tumuli Cluster in Sakurai City, Nara Prefecture)

sen.j: 東田大塚古墳（ひがいだおおつかこふん）は、奈良県桜井市の纒向古墳群に属する古墳。
sen.e: Higaida Otsuka Kofun is a kofun (ancient tomb) belonging to the Makimuku Kofun Group in Sakurai City, Nara Prefecture.
Higaida Otsuka Kofun is an ancient tomb belonging to the Makimuku-kofun Tumuli Cluster in Sakurai City, Nara Prefecture.
Higaida Otsuka Kofun is an ancient tomb belonging to the Makimuku-kofun Tumuli Cluster in Sakurai City, Nara Prefecture.

tit.cmt: 統一リストに合わせました。

sen.j: 所在地：桜井市東田字大塚
sen.e: Location: Aza Otsuka,Higaida, Sakurai City, Nara Prefecture
Location: Aza Otsuka, Higaida, Sakurai City, Nara Prefecture
sen.cmt: スペース補足しました。
sen.e: Location: Aza Otsuka, Higaida, Sakurai City, Nara Prefecture
Buried person: Unknown
Buried person: Unknown
Buried person: Unknown

sen.j: 築造時期：古墳時代前期初頭
sen.e: Time of construction: The early first half of the Kofun period
Time of construction: The early first half of the Kofun period (Tumulus period)
Time of construction: The early first half of the Kofun period (Tumulus period)

sen.j: 墳 形：纒向型前方後円墳（葺石・埴輪無し）
sen.e: Tomb shape: A Makimuku type zenpokoenfun or large key-hole shaped tomb (no fukiishi or a layer of stone covering the soil over a burial mound and no haniwa or clay image)
Tomb shape: A Makimuku type large keyhole-shaped tomb (no fukiishi [a layer of stone covering the soil over a burial mound] and no haniwa [clay image])
Tomb shape: A Makimuku type large keyhole-shaped tomb (no fukiishi [a layer of stone covering the soil over a burial mound] and no haniwa [clay image])

sen.j: 規 模：全長約96m・後円部径約64m、後円部高さ9m、周濠幅約21m。
sen.e: Size: 96m in full length, the back circular part 64m in diameter, 9m in height, the shugo (loop moat) about 21m in width
Size: Approximately 96 meters in full length, the back circular part approximately 64 meters in diameter, 9 meters in height, the shugo (surrounding moat) approximately 21 meters in width.
sen.cmt: 用語、表記を変えました。
sen.e: Size: Approximately 96 meters in full length, the back circular part approximately 64 meters in diameter, 9 meters in height, the shugo (surrounding moat) approximately 21 meters in width.
Burial spot: Not yet investigated
Burial spot: Not yet investigated
Burial spot: Not yet investigated
Unearthed goods:
Unearthed goods:
Unearthed goods:
Haji pottery (Furu 0-type)
Haji pottery (Furu 0-type)
Haji pottery (Furu 0-type)
Wooden products
Wooden products
Wooden products

sen.j: 甕棺（周濠外堤部より東海系壷片で蓋をした中部瀬戸内系土器棺埋納。）
sen.e: A burial jar (found from the outer banks of the shugo, which was a Chubu Seto type earthen coffin with a cover of the Tokai type lid)
A burial jar (found from the outer banks of the shugo, which was a Chubu Setouchi type earthen coffin with a cover of the Tokai type lid)
A burial jar (found from the outer banks of the shugo, which was a Chubu Setouchi type earthen coffin with a cover of the Tokai type lid)

sen.j: 試掘調査により前方部に盛土が残っていることが確認され、2007年4月12日、桜井市教育委員会は全長がこれまでの推測より14m長く110m以上である旨発表した。
sen.e: Excavation investigation found the remaining mound at the front part, the Sakurai City Board of Education made it public that the full length was more than 110m, 14m longer than they had surmised.

Excavation investigation found the remaining mound at the front square part, the Sakurai City Board of Education made it public that the full length was more than 110 meters, 14 meters longer than they had surmised on April 12, 2007.
sen.cmt: 訳漏れ。「2007年4月12日」を補足しました。原文に合わせ、表記を変えました。
sen.e: Excavation investigation found the remaining mound at the front square part, the Sakurai City Board of Education made it public that the full length was more than 110 meters, 14 meters longer than they had surmised on April 12, 2007.
